GetYourGuide | Multiple Positions | Berlin & Zurich | ONSITE, VISA + Assistance

GetYourGuideâ€™s online marketplace for tours, tickets, and attractions helps people find the most exciting experiences worldwide. Using technology to change the way travellers find and book activities to do, and explore their destination.

We are a customer focused data driven company and are ramping up our engineering capacity. To find out more about how we work and what we get up to visit https://inside.getyourguide.com/.

Looking for: Android Engineers | Data Scientists | Data Analysts | Data Engineers | DevOps | Front-End Engineers | Back-End Engineers | Marketing Tech Engineers | Product Managers

Find more about us and the job openings on our career page http://grnh.se/qmkt7n
